Name: Naren
Title: Yellamma Temple
Review: Balkampet Yellamma temple is a famous temple which resides at balkampet, it's very easy to reach temple from Ameerpet and Balanagar.

Name: jainms
Title: Balkampet temple
Review: have seen lot of devotees and visitors come here to this temple. I was staying near this temple for 3-4 months.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Divine place in SR nagar
Review: This is the oldest temple in SR nagar. Must visit place especially during Bonalu festivals and during durga puja.

Name: Sumit S
Title: Faith
Review: People have great faith in this temple. It is near my home and I visit it quite often to offer my prayers

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: devotional and enlightening
Review: we get to see Lord Ganesh first as he is the one to receive our puja first as he is considered to be the "pradama pujyudu"--meaning one who is to be devoted first before any other god or goddess. the designs on the wall of the temple are good but lack the intricacy we see in much older temples.

Name: Hari K
Title: Most Popular Historical Temple
Review: The Temple will give you a very peace mind and blessings from God Yellamma Thalli.Here Bonalu are very special event.

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: best temple
Review: best temple to visit as the god in the holy well , all dreams come true by visiting this temple a peaceful place .

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: spiritual as well as landmark
Review: This place is a big landmark in the area and people visit this place.Roads around are crowded but this place could be visited once for spiritual reasons

Name: ravi p
Title: Felt Devine and happy
Review: I felt very nice while visiting this temple.. seems to be very powerful ammavaru..It was Wednesday around 10 so there wasn’t much rush so had good archana and peaceful darshan too..Archana and special 10rs darshan ticket makes it quick To see ammavaru but it wasn’t required today as not much rush..Don’t forget to take ammavari abhishekha water as there is a say that it’s very auspicious water and cures diseases..Only issue is lack of parking for 4 wheeler.. if it’s not busy then you can get parking in side lanes but else difficult as temple is on main road..

Name: koteswararao
Title: temple with bhathi
Review: balkampet  temple  is famous for all  Hyderabad and many visits on many times feel that  good happen if they wish

Name: TADAKAMADLA A
Title: Powerful Temple
Review: Balkampet temple is very famous and most trusted temple by people, even Nita Ambani also visits the temple.

Name: Omkar T
Title: The Most Powerful Goddess!!!Yellamma thalli is Swayambhu in Balkampet
Review: The Great Powerful Goddesses Yellamma Thali is Swayambhu at Balkampet in a well.This Temple  has a History of Thousands of Years, we Need to get down to the well for Darshan of Goddesses Yellamma Thalli. Most Peace full & Powerful place in India.Aabhishakam will starts Daily Morning 5am to 6am, & Temple Closes 8:30PM.  Every Tuesday and Sunday there will be Special Pooja's like Pancha Aarthi's. Special Pooja's will held in the NavaRathri days. Yellamma Thali Kalayanam will Happen on every Year First tuesday of Aashadam masam, Where Lakes of Devotes will darshan yellamma thalli on that Special day.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: A famous and powerfull temple
Review: MANY OF US THEY DO KNOW ABT tHIS PLACE .HERE U CAN SEE A bIG STATUE WITH LOTUS YELLAMMA Devi, inside many idols r beautiful nice 2see.First u can see ganesh idol inside u must go to D underground area to see yellamma goddess after that From right side u see pochama devi,naga devatha,&annapurna devi etc.every Friday they put anadhanam .& For spl darshan/laddu/pulihora only 10rs .if u do archanas/homam/or any sevas refer to pic [photo 3]details r available

Name: samvarth
Title: Some power in the temple
Review: I can tell you that there is some peacefulness once you enter it. Considered powerful by local people and it can be easily reached by local transport.Worth going

Name: sritilak
Title: Goddess temple
Review: This temple  is sacred temple of Hindus. In telangana Hyderabad. Mostly  this place is preferred to visit in Friday and Sunday.

Name: Raneshtalari
Title: Very powerfull Godess
Review: Even Ambani wife had visited this place, people cut hen and goat if the wish is fulfilled, the place is very powerful.

Name: Krishna P
Title: Historic temple
Review: Visited many times this temple.Temple maintained by local body.Must visit when you are in Ameerpet or SR Nagar area.fast darshan rs 10.Authentic south Indian village type temple.Temple offers many special sevas for which tickets are available at temple premises.

Name: Seaside702735
Title: Yellamma temple
Review: Very peaceful and powerful temple in Hyderabad,Jai yellamma talli, every one must visit this temple thank you

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Balkampet yellamma temple
Review: This is one of the famous temple in hyderabad. this temple is famous for boanalu. this is a very powerful temple.

Name: renu_73
Title: for those who believe in the power of the goddess
Review: This Temple is always crowded and has a huge number of followers who come there regularly for the blessings of "Maa". She is believed to fulfill all the wishes of her devotees. It is in the crowded part of the city but is a large temple.

Name: pavankumarraju
Title: Famous temple
Review: Balkampet Yellamma Temple is one of the famous temple in Hyderabad. It is situated near SR nagar. Lot of people visit this temple from every where.

Name: saikiran v
Title: Worship
Review: Nice temple and powerful godesses. If we wish anything and pray to that godess . Definetly it will be done withing 1 week.

Name: Naresh k
Title: Information About the people
Review: "people those days dug a well for water there they found surprisingly a rock with a sulpture of a devi engraved on it ,they try to remove it and wanted to build well for their agriculture usage"Here,some lines above describes about people, may i know the details about those people behind ?if you have no idea about those people. contact "kOTHAPALLY" surname family people nearby the temple, they will provide you all the details. thanks.

Name: V V S Ganesh N
Title: Famous for  Bonalu Festival
Review: Balkampet Yellamma Temple is Famous for  Bonalu Festival in telangana region and everytime the temple is loaded with local people with offerings to goddess yellamama on wide scale.

Title: Temple
Review: Very popular god Easy to reach here Balkampet Yellamma temple is an Hindu goddess temple located at Balkampet in Hyderabad. Yearly in ashadamasam kalayanavostam is done. It is very famous among Bonaalu and on Sundays

Name: nagesh1955
Title: Visit of balkampet temple
Review: Very big temple in the cloud area. Jathara will start in ashadamasam, lot of people will come to this temple

Name: Karthik T
Title: Very powerful temple
Review: Balkampet yellama temple very traditional and very powerful goddess Yellama Talli and I visit first it was a pleasant experience

Name: raja p
Title: popular goddess in balkampet
Review: this is famous yellamma temple in balkam pet.this temple opens by6am to 1pm and 3pm to 8pm.the goddess yellamma is 10feet in height.it is one of the oldest temple in hyderabad.

Name: Hima H
Title: Religious
Review: Famous and powerful ammavaru. Same yallamma temple is there in gajularamaram. Must visit. Please come to ushamullapudi cardiac center.its walkable from there

Name: Ermroy
Title: 700 years old historical renuka yellamma temple
Review: Yellamma temple known as balkampet yellamma temple in hyderabad is very ancient temple with great history.15 th century then nobody knows anything about this particular place filled with trees and agriculture fields ,people those days dug a well for water there they found surprisingly a rock with a sulpture of a devi engraved on it ,they try to remove it and wanted to build well for their agriculture usage ,many people tried but coulnot move the stone because there is so much of water ,people droped the idea of shifting the idol and built a small temple for the idol.overa period of time people came to know the water which is flowing from the head side of idol has curative powers and skin diseaces are being cured and many more experiences of people over a period of time became very popular .in1978 endowments department of the state took over the administration of the temple and alloted funds for development of the temple.to day this temple is in the heart of the city commercial center visited by thousands of people from all over the country .many engineears tried to source the water which is flowing from head side portion of the idol couldnot source the water flowing there at one they also tried to change the course of the water flow they could not do it now they pump the water continuously and distribute to people as holy water and also for curative powers of the water people from all walks of life come and fetch water for their skin problems .to day in a year there will be special poojas lakhs of people visit this temple ,every tuesday and sunday thousands of people visit this place in total faith.now this temple has become huge place of worship ,recently reliance chair person mrs neetha ambani also visited this place for darshan ,during ashadam and sravanam months supposed to be very auspicious ,every day the rituals starts from morning 5am and from 7am long quese for having darshan of this deity .this particular balkampet road as i told you is thickly populated area and a busy commercial center car parking is a problem .the new formed state of telangaana chief minister popularly known as kcr also visited this place .there is also nagdevta temple with in this premises attracts thousands of people for special poojas..
